DOC.brief_summary: Patients advance metastatic ( stage IIIB-IV ) non small cell lung cancer receive prior chemotherapy treat erlotinib 150 mg day sorafenib 400 mg twice day . The objective study assess efficacy safety combination treatment . Additional exploratory study objective correlation biomarkers image modality potentially predictive response ( progression free ) survival .
